name: Yume Nikki: Happiness (Fangame)
description:
This is my  contribution to the  dream diary jam! I had alot of fun making it along side   Ordinarydays  who  did    alot   of the  art/sprites in the game!

I am not a programmer so there may be bugs in it. its a demo/ proof of concept. feel free to let me know if there is any glitches and bugs. and if you enjoy it consider following me on my twitter!   Darkley tv  or leave a comment what you thought of it!

Warning! while not a Horror game there is scary moments!
